analysis.description:
PlayerBook.registerNameCore (/unique_chucks/40/0xe473b61622b3375ad9aaf4d9d74dbc325c9c008e.sol#371-407) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- yyyy.transfer(((address(this).balance).mul(80) / 100)) (/unique_chucks/40/0xe473b61622b3375ad9aaf4d9d74dbc325c9c008e.sol#393-395)
	- gggg.transfer(address(this).balance) (/unique_chucks/40/0xe473b61622b3375ad9aaf4d9d74dbc325c9c008e.sol#395-398)
NameFilter.nameFilter (/unique_chucks/40/0xe473b61622b3375ad9aaf4d9d74dbc325c9c008e.sol#654-759) is declared view but contains assembly code
_affID in PlayerBook.registerNameXaddrFromDapp (/unique_chucks/40/0xe473b61622b3375ad9aaf4d9d74dbc325c9c008e.sol#519) is a local variable never initialiazed
_affID in PlayerBook.registerNameXnameFromDapp (/unique_chucks/40/0xe473b61622b3375ad9aaf4d9d74dbc325c9c008e.sol#555) is a local variable never initialiazed

PlayerBook.addMeToGame has external calls inside a loop:
	- games_[_gameID].receivePlayerNameList(_pID,plyrNameList_[_pID][ii]) (/unique_chucks/40/0xe473b61622b3375ad9aaf4d9d74dbc325c9c008e.sol#320-325)

PlayerBook.addMeToAllGames has external calls inside a loop:
	- games_[i].receivePlayerInfo(_pID,_addr,_name,_laff) (/unique_chucks/40/0xe473b61622b3375ad9aaf4d9d74dbc325c9c008e.sol#341-345)

PlayerBook.addMeToAllGames has external calls inside a loop:
	- games_[i].receivePlayerNameList(_pID,plyrNameList_[_pID][ii]) (/unique_chucks/40/0xe473b61622b3375ad9aaf4d9d74dbc325c9c008e.sol#347-348)

PlayerBook.registerNameCore has external calls inside a loop:
	- games_[i].receivePlayerInfo(_pID,_addr,_name,_affID) (/unique_chucks/40/0xe473b61622b3375ad9aaf4d9d74dbc325c9c008e.sol#401)

NameFilter.nameFilter uses assembly (/unique_chucks/40/0xe473b61622b3375ad9aaf4d9d74dbc325c9c008e.sol#654-759)
